name: Venom Inc.
description: '''Venom Inc.''' are a British [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band from [[Newcastle upon Tyne]]. Formed in 2015, the band features former [[Venom (band)|Venom]] member [[Tony Dolan|Tony "Demolition Man" Dolan]], and previously [[Jeffrey Dunn|Jeffrey "Mantas" Dunn]] and Anthony "Abaddon" Bray. Bray was replaced by [[Jeramie Kling|Jeramie "War Machine" Kling]] in 2018, who was replaced by Marc "JXN" Jackson in 2024. The group has released two studio albums.
